title: Iconed
author: Kenny Wang
excerpt: Turn any image into stunning icons for apps and folders. This tool helps you create macOS/iOS icons with full Retina (1x/2x/3x) support, GIF cropping, and folder icon customization. Also supports format conversion (PNG, JPEG, etc.).
text: Turn any image into stunning icons for apps and folders. This tool helps you create macOS/iOS icons with full Retina (1x/2x/3x) support, GIF cropping, and folder icon customization. Also supports format conversion (PNG, JPEG, etc.).
html: Turn any image into stunning icons for apps and folders. This tool helps you create macOS/iOS icons with full Retina (1x/2x/3x) support, GIF cropping, and folder icon customization. Also supports format conversion (PNG, JPEG, etc.).
